p: In a preliminary assessment, we compared the inhibitory capacity of the essential oils with that of the broad-range viral replication inhibitor chloroquine [ 36]. As shown in Fig 4A, at the non-toxic concentration 1Ã—CC 10 for the essential oils and for chloroquine, cell viability was not affected. Maximal reduction of luciferase activity and residual infectivity was observed for the PG essential oil ( Fig 4B and 4C).
